## FieldColour.setColumns() method

Set a custom grid size for this field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setColumns(columns: number): FieldColour;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  columns | number | Number of columns for this block, or 0 to use default (FieldColour.COLUMNS). |

<b>Returns:</b>

[FieldColour](./blockly.fieldcolour.md)
